      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()
        Gets the type of condition.

      • getSequence

        int getSequence()
        Gets the sequence number. Conditions are to be evaluated from lowest to higher.
        Returns:
        the sequence number

      • getOperator

        int getOperator()
        Gets the operator. Possible values are: 0 = AND 1 = OR 2 = AND NOT 3 = OR NOT
        Returns:
        the operator value
